issue.title: [networking.ts] Remove spurious nested value_type buffer sequence requirement

discussion.p: The post-condition requirements for ConstBufferSequence and MutableBufferSequence refer to X::value_type, but no such nested type is required. The lambda expression passed to equal can use auto const& parameter types instead.

blockquote.p: This wording is relative to N4588.

discussion.p: The alternative wording prevents the need for auto parameters because it takes advantage of the "convertible to" requirement.
discussion.note: 2017-10-20 Moved to Tentatively Ready after 5 positive votes on c++std-lib.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4588.
